014
015package org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.fields;
016
017import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.Field;
018import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.InterpolatorFactory;
019import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.TransformerRegistry;
020import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.ValueProvider;
021import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.definitions.DateDefinition;
022
023import java.time.ZoneId;
024import java.time.ZonedDateTime;
025import java.time.temporal.ChronoUnit;
026import java.util.StringJoiner;
027
028import com.google.common.annotations.VisibleForTesting;
029
030
031public final class DateField extends Field<ZonedDateTime, DateDefinition> {
032
033    private final ValueProvider valueProvider;
034    private final ZoneId timezone;
035
036    @VisibleForTesting
037    public static DateField forTesting(DateDefinition dateDefinition, ValueProvider valueProvider) {
038        return new DateField(dateDefinition, valueProvider, InterpolatorFactory.forTesting(), TransformerRegistry.INSTANCE);
039    }
040
041    public DateField(final DateDefinition dateDefinition, final ValueProvider valueProvider,
042        final InterpolatorFactory interpolatorFactory,  final TransformerRegistry transformerRegistry) {
043        super(dateDefinition, interpolatorFactory, transformerRegistry);
044
045        this.valueProvider = valueProvider;
046        this.timezone = dateDefinition.getTimezone();
047    }
048
049    @Override
050    public String getFieldName() {
051        return fieldDefinition.getId();
052    }
053
054    @Override
055    public String getValue() {
056        ZonedDateTime date = valueProvider.getValue()
057            .map(value -> fieldDefinition.getParser().apply(value))
058            .orElseGet(() -> fieldDefinition.getValue()
059                .map(fieldDefinition.getLongParser())
060                .orElseGet(this::now));
061
062        String result = formatResult(date);
063
064        if (fieldDefinition.getFormatter().isPresent()) {
065            // format was set, store time in the chosen format
066            valueProvider.setValue(result);
067        } else {
068            // not format was set. Store time as millis.
069            valueProvider.setValue(Long.toString(date.toInstant().toEpochMilli()));
070        }
071
072        return result;
073    }
074
075    @Override
076    public boolean isExposeAsProperty() {
077        return fieldDefinition.isExport();
078    }
079
080    private ZonedDateTime now() {
081        // code only saves in millisecond precision.
082        return ZonedDateTime.now(timezone).truncatedTo(ChronoUnit.MILLIS);
083    }
084
085    @Override
086    public String toString() {
087        return new StringJoiner(", ", DateField.class.getSimpleName() + "[", "]")
088            .add("valueProvider=" + valueProvider)
089            .toString();
090    }
091}
